name: PDFOutline
desc: A PDFOutline object is an element in a tree-structured hierarchy that can represent the structure of a PDF document.

items.name: var document: PDFDocument?
items.desc: Returns the document with which the outline is associated.

items.name: var numberOfChildren: Int
items.desc: Returns the number of child outline objects in the outline.

items.name: var parent: PDFOutline?
items.desc: Returns the parent outline object of the outline (returns NULL if called on the root outline object).

items.name: func child(at: Int) -> PDFOutline?
items.desc: Returns the child outline object at the specified index.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: Returns the index of the outline.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: Returns the label for the outline.

items.name: var destination: PDFDestination?
items.desc: Returns the destination associated with the outline.

items.name: var action: PDFAction?
items.desc: Returns the action performed when users click the outline.

items.name: func insertChild(PDFOutline, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts the specified outline object at the specified index.

items.name: func removeFromParent()
items.desc: Removes the outline object from its parent (does nothing if outline object is the root outline object).

items.name: var isOpen: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the outline object is initially disclosed.
